title: Nationwide manhunt for "cold-blooded" grandmother
text:
Nationwide manhunt for "cold-blooded" grandmother 1:33am BST - 01:28 
Authorities are on a nationwide manhunt for 56-year-old grandmother Lois Riess from Minnesota who is wanted for two murders in two different states and was last spotted in Texas. Colette Luke has more.
